title: Best of The Herd for Sep 01, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Sep 01, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin


Chris Paul is a winner despite what the critics say

The Chiefs have a good chance to be a dynasty

Giannis Antetokounmpo can still improve from an unfortunate trend

Donald Trump is trying to save the Big 10


Guest: Sam Amick

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
